cars.name: 2013 Alfa Romeo Giulietta 1.4 MultiAir Factory
cars.description:
STANDARD FEATURES
~ Bi-xenons with AFS function
~ Dual-zone climate control
~ Sound system with MP3/USB/Bluetooth and Blue&Me
~ Steering radio and phone controls
~ Leather Seats (Brownish-Beige Colour)
~ LED DRLs
~18-inch alloys
~ paddle shifter
~ 6 speed dct

SAFETY FEATURES
~ Six Airrbags
~ VDC (Alfa’s name for ESP),
~ ABS, EBD, HBA (Hydraulic Brake Assist)
~ MSR (Modular System Regulator)
~ CBC (Control Brake Cornering System)
~ Hill Holder Control
~ ASR (Anti Slip Regulator)
~ DST (Dynamic Steering Torque System)
~ TTC (Torque Transfer Control System)

cars.name: 2012 BMW F30 328i 2.0(A) Spec Luxury Crazy
cars.description:
TL Yee Auto (M) Sdn Bhd
Google Maps & Waze - T L Yee Auto (M) Sdn Bhd (HQ) Lot 718
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Compare Car Price And Condition (Banding Harga Kami Dan Kualiti Kereta)
2. Guaranteed True Year Of Manufacture (Jaminan Tahun Kereta Dibuat)
3. High Loan
4. Low Downpayment
5. Low Interest rate
6. Fast and Easy Loan Approved
7. Trade In Accepted
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Year Make: 2012
Year Reg: 2012
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cash : RM 85,718
Loan : RM 87,718
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- One Careful Owner
- Original Factory Paint
- Accident Free
- Low Mileage
- Seldom Use
- All Original Parts
- All Parts In Good Condition
- Well Maintain
- Smooth Engine And Gearbox
- Kept Well by Last Owner
- Low Fuel Consumption
- Full Bodykit and Spoiler
- Tiptronic 8 Speed Gear Box
- Paddle Shift + -
- Original Factory Alloy Rims
- 4pcs 95% New Tyres
- ABS/EBD
- Keyless
- Push Start Button
- SRS Airbags
- BMW Audio System
- Original Factory DVD Player
- Multifunction Steering With Audio Control
- Fog Lamps
- Full Leather Seats
- Nice & Clean Interior
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Document For Loan Needed
Personal:
1. I/C & Driving Licence Copy
2. Latest 3 Months Payslip & Bank Statement
3. EPF Statement

Company:
1. Director I/C & Driving Licence Copy
2. SSM Company
3. Latest 6 Months Bank Statement
